title: Snake Game
text: Simple C++ game featuring a bot that uses the Dijkstra algorithm implemented in O(n). When the apple is not in reach, the X represents the most hopeful escape. The snake should zig-zag without blocking it. In progress.

title: Web Scraper
text:
Automatically shops on the web, looking for products with specific characteristics under a price threshold. It updates a sheets document and notifies me.
(Python, Selenium, Google apis)

title: Transaction
text:
Automating analysis of my personal finances.
(Python, Tesseract-OCR, Google Sheets api)

title: Web Game
text:
A game intended for movie buffs who want to challenge their knowledge of their favorite movies.
(Python, Flask, ffmpeg, Cloudinary api, html, js)

title: Minishell
text: A shell written in C that mimicks bash.

title: Isometric wireframe projection
text: A C program that displays a map.

title: Philosophers
text: A puzzle in C as part of my studies at 42 where N threads must share ressources fairly. I worked with threads, mutexes, forks and semaphores.

title: ft_irc
text: A chat server in C++ that follows the IRC protocol. Compatible with any IRC client and robust thanks to our stress tests.
